name: modflow converter
desc: Import MODFLOW data from various sources.

properties.name: Parse Project
properties.desc: The Parse Project button will cause the module to read the .

properties.name: Convert MODFLOW Data
properties.desc: Selecting the Convert MODFLOW Data toggle will tell the module to convert Head (or Cell Budget) data for each time step.

properties.name: Convert MT3D Data
properties.desc: Selecting the Convert MT3D Data toggle will tell the module to convert Concentration data for each time step.

properties.name: Convert For MODPATH
properties.desc: Selecting the Convert For MODPATH toggle will tell the module to convert all data necessary for the MODPATH module.
